div.head: 產腸不收
div.div: failure of the birth intestine to contract

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: failure of the birth intestine to contract

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with yin tuo 陰脫 , yin prolapse . Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry du huo 獨活 quotes Dou men fang Recipe book. Northern Song era or 斗門方 earlier. : 產腸不收：用油五斤，煉熟，盆盛。令婦坐盆中，飯久 , “For failure of the birth intestine to contract : Take 5 jin oil, boil thoroughly on fire. Fill a basin with it and let the women sit in the basin for the length of a meal”.
